metadata.name: Merced River
metadata.description:
Number 1 in...
The Spectrum Motion Series .
Merced River, Yosemite valley. California, USA.
Soothing sounds of the river in combination with the golden colour changes in the infrared spectrum.
This MP4 is part of a project to bring photos to life using colour infrared photography and moving photos. 
Created February 2023.
Laurence Davis Photo / @davisvisions
